name: filter_daterange
description: Drops observations from a collection that have been captured before a start or after a given end date.

extent.description: Temporal extent specified by a start and an end time, each formatted as a [RFC 3339](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339) date-time. Open date ranges are supported and can be specified by setting one of the times to null. Setting both entries to null is not allowed.
